PackageOracle.name: DA_TICKET
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TICKET
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.127359000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,completion_dt IN DATE
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,completion_dt IN DATE
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,completion_dt IN DATE
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_ticket;

body.name: DA_TICKET
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TICKET
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.156371000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,completion_dt IN DATE
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || requested_completion_dttm || '|' || completion_dt || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || reason_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || comment_txt || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || dnis_cd || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_ticket a
(
a.ticket_interaction_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.create_dttm
,a.requested_completion_dttm
,a.completion_dt
,a.completion_cd
,a.reason_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.comment_txt
,a.service_address_id
,a.dnis_cd
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_ticket_interaction_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.create_dttm
,add.requested_completion_dttm
,add.completion_dt
,add.completion_cd
,add.reason_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.comment_txt
,add.service_address_id
,add.dnis_cd
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.ticket_interaction_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,completion_dt IN DATE
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || requested_completion_dttm || '|' || completion_dt || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || reason_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || comment_txt || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || dnis_cd || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_ticket a
(
a.ticket_interaction_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.create_dttm
,a.requested_completion_dttm
,a.completion_dt
,a.completion_cd
,a.reason_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.comment_txt
,a.service_address_id
,a.dnis_cd
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_ticket_interaction_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.create_dttm
,add.requested_completion_dttm
,add.completion_dt
,add.completion_cd
,add.reason_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.comment_txt
,add.service_address_id
,add.dnis_cd
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,create_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,requested_completion_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,completion_dt IN DATE
,completion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,service_address_id IN NUMBER
,dnis_cd IN VARCHAR2
,bill_stop_dt IN DATE
,bill_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket.add, parms=' || ticket_interaction_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || create_dttm || '|' || requested_completion_dttm || '|' || completion_dt || '|' || completion_cd || '|' || reason_cd || '|' || cancel_cd || '|' || comment_txt || '|' || service_address_id || '|' || dnis_cd || '|' || bill_stop_dt || '|' || bill_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_ticket a
(
a.ticket_interaction_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.create_dttm
,a.requested_completion_dttm
,a.completion_dt
,a.completion_cd
,a.reason_cd
,a.cancel_cd
,a.comment_txt
,a.service_address_id
,a.dnis_cd
,a.bill_stop_dt
,a.bill_start_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.ticket_interaction_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.create_dttm
,add.requested_completion_dttm
,add.completion_dt
,add.completion_cd
,add.reason_cd
,add.cancel_cd
,add.comment_txt
,add.service_address_id
,add.dnis_cd
,add.bill_stop_dt
,add.bill_start_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket.del, parms=' || ticket_interaction_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_ticket a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.ticket_interaction_id = del.ticket_interaction_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket.del');

END del;

END da_ticket;
